description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The effects of the oil crisis on the Federal Republic and legislation to secure existing supplies; a look at the DRLR, the German research and experimentation institute for aviation; Germany's oldest city - Trier, also the birthplace of Karl Marx; fashion and clothing industry in Berlin; wind surfing, a new sport, is shown off the shores of Sylt - a popular North Sea holiday island.
